summary: 1991  was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Melanie Oudin  is an American tennis player and former world junior no. 2. She was a member of the American Fed Cup team from 2009 to 2011 and winner of the 2011 U.S. Open mixed doubles title, with fellow American player Jack Sock.
Oudin was propelled to stardom as a 17-year-old, in the middle of 2009, when she reached the round of 16 of the Wimbledon Championships, followed by a quarter-final at the US Open a month and a half later. She reached a career-high ranking of World No. 31 on April 19, 2010.
title: Melanie Oudin
